itinerary.title: Welcome Aboard & Sunset Sail
itinerary.description: Embark on the cruise ship and settle into your cabin. Enjoy a welcome dinner followed by a stunning sunset sail along the coast of Cancun.

itinerary.title: Isla Mujeres Exploration
itinerary.description: Spend the day on the beautiful Isla Mujeres. Enjoy snorkeling in the clear waters of Playa Norte, explore the island by golf cart, or visit the historic lighthouse.

itinerary.title: Cozumel Adventure
itinerary.description: Discover the incredible marine life around Cozumel, one of the world's top diving and snorkeling destinations. Participate in a guided tour or explore on your own.
